HOME.DESCRIPTION_SPECIALIZED: I am a makeup artist specializing in bridal makeup in Rome and I operate throughout Italy.
HOME.DESCRIPTION_HAIRSTYLE: I also offer a complete bridal hairstyling service.
HOME.LOOKING_FOR_SERVICE_QUESTION: Are you looking for an all-inclusive wedding makeup and hair service?
HOME.SERVICE_DESCRIPTION_PART1: I am based in Rome, but I am available to operate throughout Italy. I am experienced in providing my all-inclusive makeup and hairstyling service, also availing myself of dedicated professionals.
HOME.SERVICE_DESCRIPTION_PART2: My home makeup and hairstylist service, directly at your wedding venue, guarantees maximum convenience and flexibility.
HOME.GOAL_BEAUTIFUL: My goal is that you can see yourself more beautiful than ever on your special day.
HOME.GUARANTEE_QUALITY_PRODUCTS_DESCRIPTION: I only use professional and safe cosmetics for your skin.
HOME.GUARANTEE_PUNCTUALITY_DESCRIPTION: I always arrive on time to guarantee you peace of mind and serenity.
HOME.GUARANTEE_PERSONALIZED_LOOK_DESCRIPTION: Makeup and hairstyle will be adapted to your style, your face, and your unique personality.
HOME.GUARANTEE_DEDICATED_ASSISTANCE_DESCRIPTI: I will accompany you step by step, listening to your every need and desire.

CHI_SONO.TITLE: About Me: My Story, Your Beauty
CHI_SONO.SUBTITLE: I am Azzurra Angius, Makeup Artist and Hair Stylist. My passion is to transform beauty, making every woman radiant and confident.
CHI_SONO.VISION_PARAGRAPH_1: Since childhood, I have been fascinated by the transformative power of makeup. It's not just about applying colors, but about enhancing each person's uniqueness, bringing out their inner light, and instilling confidence. I believe that makeup should be an expression of self, a way to celebrate one's individuality without ever distorting it.
CHI_SONO.VISION_PARAGRAPH_2: My approach is always personalized: I carefully listen to your needs, your desires, and your style, to create a look that makes you feel authentic and wonderful, whether for your special day or an important event.
CHI_SONO.VISION_PARAGRAPH_3: I work with dedication and professionalism in Rome, throughout Italy, and also in Sardinia, bringing my art directly to your home or chosen location.
CHI_SONO.TRAINING_PARAGRAPH_1: I graduated as a Make-up Artist and Hair Stylist in 2021 from a renowned Make-up Academy in Rome. This training provided me with solid foundations and advanced techniques to excel in the field, allowing me to offer a complete and professional service.
CHI_SONO.TRAINING_PARAGRAPH_2: I continuously update myself on the latest trends and techniques in the industry, participating in workshops and advanced courses to always guarantee you the best.
CHI_SONO.CTA_HEADING: Ready to Start Your Beauty Journey?
CHI_SONO.CTA_DESCRIPTION: Contact me for a personalized consultation and let's discover together how I can make your next event unforgettable.
CHI_SONO.CTA_BUTTON_ARIA: Request a consultation with Azzurra Angius

SERVIZI.HIGHLIGHT_DESCRIPTION: Your wedding day is unique and deserves an unforgettable look. I offer a personalized bridal makeup service, designed to enhance your natural beauty and ensure impeccable hold throughout the day. From the initial consultation to the makeup trial, I will be by your side to create the makeup of your dreams, perfectly suited to your dress, wedding theme, and personality.
